languages.text: "И я не собираюсь раскрывать тебе все секреты моего рода, мон... элантах. Пусть ты и помог{mf||ла} нам в сложный час, я доверился тебе лишь по просьбе Изгоя. Скажу одно — воины Алайтока прибудут к твоим звездам. Это неизменная истина".

traits.locale_text: "И я не собираюсь раскрывать тебе все секреты моего рода, мон-... элантах. Пусть ты и помог{mf||ла} нам в сложный час, я доверился тебе лишь по просьбе Изгоя. Скажу одно — войны Алайтока прибудут к твоим звездам. Это неизменная истина".
traits.speaker: Quetza_EldarGuardianDefender_Leader

languages.text: "And I am not going to reveal all the secrets of my kind to you, mon— elantach. You may have helped us in our hour of need, but I trusted you at the Outcast's behest. But I will say this — the warriors of Alaitoc are coming here, to your stars. This is an unalterable truth."
languages.original_text: "И я не собираюсь раскрывать тебе все секреты моего рода, мон... элантах. Пусть ты и помог{mf||ла} нам в сложный час, я доверился тебе лишь по просьбе Изгоя. Скажу одно — воины Алайтока прибудут к твоим звездам. Это неизменная истина".

traits.locale_text: "And I am not going to reveal all the secrets of my kind to you, mon... elantach. You may have helped us in the hour of need, but I trusted you on the Exile's behest. But I will say this — the warriors of Alaitoc will arrive at your stars. This is an unalterable truth."
traits.speaker: Quetza_EldarGuardianDefender_Leader

traits.locale_text: "And I am not going to reveal all the secrets of my kind to you, mon... elantach. You may have helped us in the hour of need, but I trusted you on the Exile's behest. But I will say this — the warriors of Alaitoc will arrive at your stars. This is an unalterable truth."

traits.speaker: Quetza_EldarGuardianDefender_Leader

traits.speaker: Quetza_EldarGuardianDefender_Leader

traits.locale_text: "And I am not going to reveal all the secrets of my kind to you, mon— elantach. You may have helped us in our hour of need, but I trusted you at the Outcast's behest. But I will say this — the warriors of Alaitoc are coming here, to your stars. This is an unalterable truth."
traits.speaker: Quetza_EldarGuardianDefender_Leader

traits.locale_text: "And I am not going to reveal all the secrets of my kind to you, mon— elantach. You may have helped us in our hour of need, but I trusted you at the Outcast's behest. But I will say this — the warriors of Alaitoc are coming here, to your stars. This is an unalterable truth."
traits.speaker: Quetza_EldarGuardianDefender_Leader

languages.text: «Y no voy a revelarte todos los secretos de mi especie, mon... elantach. Puede que nos hayas prestado ayuda en un momento de necesidad, pero ya confié en ti cuando la proscrita me lo rogó. Y te diré una cosa: los guerreros de Alaitoc llegarán aquí, a vuestras estrellas. Esto es una verdad incontestable».
languages.original_text: "And I am not going to reveal all the secrets of my kind to you, mon— elantach. You may have helped us in our hour of need, but I trusted you at the Outcast's behest. But I will say this — the warriors of Alaitoc are coming here, to your stars. This is an unalterable truth."

traits.locale_text: «Y no voy a revelarte todos los secretos de mi especie, mon... elantach. Puede que nos hayas prestado ayuda en un momento de necesidad, pero ya confié en ti cuando la proscrita me lo rogó. Y te diré una cosa: los guerreros de Alaitoc llegarán a vuestras estrellas. Esto es una verdad incontestable».
traits.speaker: Quetza_EldarGuardianDefender_Leader

languages.text: “我并不打算把我的族人所有秘密都告诉你，猴……外界人。或许你确实在我们需要帮助的时候伸出了援手，但我之所以愿意相信你，是因为流浪者的请求。不过，我可以告诉你，阿莱托克的战士已经动身前往你们的群星之中了，这个事实无可动摇。”
languages.original_text: "And I am not going to reveal all the secrets of my kind to you, mon— elantach. You may have helped us in our hour of need, but I trusted you at the Outcast's behest. But I will say this — the warriors of Alaitoc are coming here, to your stars. This is an unalterable truth."

traits.locale_text: “我并不打算把我的族人所有秘密都告诉你，猴……外界人。或许你确实在我们需要帮助的时候伸出了援手，但我之所以愿意相信你，是因为流浪者的请求。不过，我可以告诉你，阿莱托克的战士必将抵达你们的群星之中。这个事实无可动摇。”
traits.speaker: Quetza_EldarGuardianDefender_Leader

languages.text: « Et ne comptez pas sur moi pour vous révéler tous les secrets de mes semblables, mon-k... elantach. Même si vous nous avez aidés lorsque nous en avions besoin, je ne vous ai accordé ma confiance qu'à la demande de l'Errante. Je peux seulement vous dire que les guerriers d'Alaitoc vont venir ici, dans vos étoiles. C'est un fait, que vous le vouliez ou non. »
languages.original_text: "And I am not going to reveal all the secrets of my kind to you, mon— elantach. You may have helped us in our hour of need, but I trusted you at the Outcast's behest. But I will say this — the warriors of Alaitoc are coming here, to your stars. This is an unalterable truth."

traits.locale_text: « Et ne comptez pas sur moi pour vous révéler tous les secrets de mes semblables, mon-k... elantach. Même si vous nous avez aidés lorsque nous en avions besoin, je ne vous ai accordé ma confiance qu'à la demande de l'Errante. Je peux seulement vous dire que les guerriers d'Alaitoc vont arriver dans vos étoiles. C'est un fait, que vous le vouliez ou non. »
traits.speaker: Quetza_EldarGuardianDefender_Leader

languages.text: 「私の血族の秘密をすべてお前に明かすつもりはない、エランタよ。必要な時に我々を助けてくれたかもしれないが、私は追放者の頼みによって、お前を信用したまでだ。だが、これだけは言っておこう…アライトクの戦士たちが、お前たちの星に到着するだろう。これは不変の真実だ」
languages.original_text: "And I am not going to reveal all the secrets of my kind to you, mon— elantach. You may have helped us in our hour of need, but I trusted you at the Outcast's behest. But I will say this — the warriors of Alaitoc are coming here, to your stars. This is an unalterable truth."

traits.locale_text: 「私の血族の秘密をすべてお前に明かすつもりはない、エランタよ。必要な時に我々を助けてくれたかもしれないが、私は追放者の頼みによって、お前を信用したまでだ。だが、これだけは言っておこう…アライトクの戦士たちが、お前たちの星に到着するだろう。これは不変の真実だ」
traits.speaker: Quetza_EldarGuardianDefender_Leader

languages.text: "Und ich werde Euch nicht alle Geheimnisse meines Volkes preisgeben, Chem- ... Elantach. Ihr mögt uns in der Stunde unserer Not geholfen haben, doch ich habe Euch nur auf Wunsch der Ausgestoßenen vertraut. Eines sage ich jedoch: Die Krieger von Alaitoc werden zu Euren Sternen kommen. Das ist eine unabänderliche Wahrheit."
languages.original_text: "And I am not going to reveal all the secrets of my kind to you, mon— elantach. You may have helped us in our hour of need, but I trusted you at the Outcast's behest. But I will say this — the warriors of Alaitoc are coming here, to your stars. This is an unalterable truth."

traits.locale_text: "Und ich werde Euch nicht alle Geheimnisse meines Volkes preisgeben, Chem- ... Elantach. Ihr mögt uns in der Stunde unserer Not geholfen haben, doch ich habe Euch nur auf Wunsch der Ausgestoßenen vertraut. Eines sage ich jedoch: Die Krieger von Alaitoc werden zu Euren Sternen kommen. Das ist eine unabänderliche Wahrheit."
traits.speaker: Quetza_EldarGuardianDefender_Leader

languages.text: "Ayrıca soydaşlarımın tüm sırlarını sana açıklamayacağım mon... Elantach. İhtiyaç duyduğumuz vakitte yardımımıza koşmuş olabilirsin ancak sana güvenmemi sağlayan, Yurtsuz'un sözleriydi. Şunu söylemeden edemeyeceğim: Alaitoc savaşçıları buraya, yıldızlarınıza doğru yol alıyor. Bu hakikati değiştiremezsin."
languages.original_text: "And I am not going to reveal all the secrets of my kind to you, mon— elantach. You may have helped us in our hour of need, but I trusted you at the Outcast's behest. But I will say this — the warriors of Alaitoc are coming here, to your stars. This is an unalterable truth."

traits.locale_text: "Ayrıca soydaşlarımın tüm sırlarını sana açıklamayacağım mon... Elantach. İhtiyaç duyduğumuz vakitte yardımımıza koşmuş olabilirsin ancak sana güvenmemi sağlayan Yurtsuz'un sözleriydi. Şunu söylemeden edemeyeceğim: Alaitoc savaşçıları buraya, yıldızlarınıza doğru yol alıyor. Bu hakikati değiştiremezsin."
traits.speaker: Quetza_EldarGuardianDefender_Leader
